frontend.impl.items.selection

Class SelectionTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • frontend.impl.items.AbstractTool
      • frontend.impl.items.selection.SelectionTool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Tool, java.io.Serializable

    public class SelectionTool
extends AbstractTool
    This is the class for the selection tool, which creates the selection tool It extends the AbstractTool class
    Author:
    zannc2 & gfels4
    See Also:
